sentences.sContent: The government imprisoned all opposition leaders.
sentences.sCn: 政府把反对派领导人全部监禁起来。

sentences.sContent: She was imprisoned within his strong arms.
sentences.sCn: 她被他强壮的手臂搂着。

words.tran: 应判徒刑的；可判徒刑的

trans.tranOther: to put someone in prison or to keep them somewhere and prevent them from leaving
